channel.title: Cant get other people to connect to my 317!
channel.description: I portfowarded, went in client.java and gui.java for my client. Do I need to change anything else?

item.title: Cant get other people to connect to my 317!
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

i Ban U:

www.canyouseeme.org , make sure your port is open and after you click run server open up utorrent. You need to have utorrent keep your port open…

That has NEVER worked for me. Utorrent sucks, it doesn’t do anything at all when it comes to forwarding ports.

OT: Okay, so you forward port 43594 for the TCP and UDP protocol? If so, you’re straight. Now if you’re trying to host your server and/or want your friends to play, make two copies of your client(two folders);

One named private(FOR YOU)
One named public(FOR OTHERS)

In your private folder which contains your client, make sure all of the IP’s in client.java and gui.java’s are 127.0.0.1

Then compile, and save. Use this client to login to your server, and do not distribute that client to anyone. It is only for you to connect.
Finally, in your public folder, change the IP’s in client.java and gui.java to your NO-IP. Or your Hamachi IP/VPS IP.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant get other people to connect to my 317!
